Package maze

Interface Room

  • public interface Room
    A Room in a Maze.
    Author:
    jcollard, jddevaug

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getFullDescription()
      Returns a full description of this Room.
      ListInterface<Room> getRooms()
      Returns a ListInterface of the Rooms which can be reached from this Room.
      java.lang.String getShortDescription()
      Returns a short description of this Room.
      boolean isExit()
      Returns true if this Room is an exit and false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • getFullDescription

        java.lang.String getFullDescription()
        Returns a full description of this Room. This is a description seen when someone is inside of this Room.
        Returns:
        a full description of this Room

      • getShortDescription

        java.lang.String getShortDescription()
        Returns a short description of this Room. This is a description seen when someone is in an adjacent Room.
        Returns:
        a short description of this Room.

      • isExit

        boolean isExit()
        Returns true if this Room is an exit and false otherwise. When someone is in this Room they may exit the Maze
        Returns:
        true if this Room is an exit and false otherwise.

      • getRooms

        ListInterface<Room> getRooms()
        Returns a ListInterface of the Rooms which can be reached from this Room.
        Returns:
        a ListInterface of the Rooms which can be reached from this Room
